There's a monster on the island
that apparently hoards a bit of cash. 
It's supposedly stashing it away
in some cave―― 
Seriously, it's a sign of the times
if a monster is saving up money. 
If it turns out to have more than my salary,
I'd be pretty annoyed――

No matter how many monsters I take down 
on this island, they just keep coming back. 
What's going on here?
If there's one tip I have, it's to defeat 
them without dying. 
Ah―― meeting that person at the 
barracks is my only pleasure―― 
Oh, but that's not really a tip!

forming at the outpost inn on the island?

wait for treatment――

if I can't see that person!

Everything went dark in front of me,
and my comrades were all lying down.
In the next moment, I found myself suddenly
engulfed in a bizarre light,
and my consciousness slipped away―― 
At that moment, my wife's face flashed in my mind.
I bit down and ran, managing to get back somehow.

Napping in the sea breeze on this 
island is just the best―― 
but then some fool showed up 
to ruin my fun. 
They were making such a fuss 
that I couldn't catch a nap!

I'm not slacking on my 
mission while napping here!

really do seem to love that sort of thing!

some monsters—then he ended up

目の前の光景、全てが凶気に満ちている

もう二度とあんな場所には近づかないと誓うよ
好奇心？　そんなものは命の重さに比べれば
いつだって粉々にできるさ――

I admit I was foolish to go 
to such a dangerous place— 
but everything I saw was 
filled with malice. 
That's how it felt to me— 
I swear I'll never go near 
such a place again. 
Curiosity? That can always be 
shattered against the weight of life.
